attributes.action: grant a Knighthood to Edward Lister, Leader of Wandsworth Council for services to local Government
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Edward Lister has led Wandsworth Council to deliver ever higher quality services at consistently low levels of Rates, Community Charge and now Council Tax.

His authority has gained 86 Charter Marks (the highest number of any authority) a consistent excellent/4 star rating from the Audit Commission, top (perfect) score in the country on the Use of Resources rating, and the highest public satisfaction level of any authority in the recent Government ‘Place’ survey this Summer.

It currently has, and quite regularly has had, the lowest Council Tax in the country, and over the last 25 years or so has had the lowest average local taxation imposition on residents of any U.K. Council.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
